requests.name: focused_core
requests.description: Focused analysis core SQL queries for a single tournament DB

queries.name: match_counts
queries.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS matches FROM matches

queries.name: avg_duration
queries.sql: SELECT AVG(duration_secs) AS avg_duration FROM matches

queries.name: goals_per_match
queries.sql: SELECT AVG(score_left + score_right) AS goals_per_match FROM matches

queries.name: scoreless_rate
queries.sql: SELECT AVG(CASE WHEN score_left + score_right = 0 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) AS scoreless_rate FROM matches

queries.name: shots_total
queries.sql: SELECT SUM(shots_attempted) AS shots_attempted, SUM(shots_made) AS shots_made FROM player_stats

queries.name: avg_shot_quality
queries.sql: SELECT AVG(avg_shot_quality) AS avg_shot_quality FROM player_stats

queries.name: shot_start_events
queries.sql: SELECT match_id, time_ms, data FROM events WHERE event_type = 'SS'
queries.notes: Use to inspect shot start positions and quality.

queries.name: shot_release_events
queries.sql: SELECT match_id, time_ms, data FROM events WHERE event_type = 'SR'
queries.notes: Use to inspect shot charge, angle, and power.

queries.name: ai_goal_changes
queries.sql: SELECT match_id, COUNT(*) AS ai_goal_changes FROM events WHERE event_type = 'AG' GROUP BY match_id

queries.name: steal_attempts
queries.sql: SELECT match_id, COUNT(*) AS steal_attempts FROM events WHERE event_type = 'SA' GROUP BY match_id

queries.name: event_counts
queries.sql: SELECT event_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM events GROUP BY event_type

queries.name: low_shot_levels
queries.sql: SELECT level_name, COUNT(*) AS matches FROM ( SELECT m.id, m.level_name, SUM(ps.shots_attempted) AS shots FROM matches m JOIN player_stats ps ON ps.match_id = m.id GROUP BY m.id ) WHERE shots <= 5 GROUP BY level_name ORDER BY matches DESC

queries.name: per_level_summary
queries.sql: SELECT m.level_name, COUNT(DISTINCT m.id) AS matches, AVG(m.score_left + m.score_right) AS goals_per_match, SUM(ps.shots_attempted) AS shots_attempted, SUM(ps.shots_made) AS shots_made, AVG(CASE WHEN m.score_left + m.score_right = 0 THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) AS scoreless_rate, AVG(ps.avg_shot_quality) AS avg_shot_quality FROM matches m JOIN player_stats ps ON ps.match_id = m.id GROUP BY m.level_name ORDER BY scoreless_rate DESC, shots_attempted ASC
